fields.name: Ability:
fields.value:
-Bounce at someone’s house at night
-Choose a second target to control people to

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Your target and their visitors will be sent the attached gif
-Your target and their visitors will all by controlled into your second target
-Your target and their visitors gain roleblock immunity for the night
-If anyone says the word “Pretzels” day 1, you deal a powerful attack to your target and their visitors as well
-You learn the name and role of everyone you control
-Anyone visiting you will also be controlled, unless they’re within the support or killing subalignments
-If day 5 is reached and you are not dead, then you automatically activate attribute 4
-You learn everyone that has been sent the attached gif, and may access one of their private chats that are not dead chat or their personal channel. You also hear their whispers
-You can only see two chats at a time, and learn everyone there
-This role can only roll if there is at least 1 town of salem role from the base game

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make it so that any base town of salem roles lose
